Greetings to President of Cape Verde
    Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on July 1 sent a message of greetings to Pedro Pires, President of Cape Verde, on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of its independence and declaration of the Republic.
 In the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for the prosperity and development of the country.
